CS8618.shortDescription: Null atanamaz alan, oluşturucudan çıkış yaparken null olmayan bir değer içermelidir. Alanı null atanabilir olarak bildirmeyi düşünün.

S101.shortDescription: Types should be named in PascalCase
S101.fullDescription: Shared naming conventions allow teams to collaborate efficiently.

S2094.fullDescription: There is no good excuse for an empty class. If it’s being used simply as a common extension point, it should be replaced with an interface. If it was stubbed in as a placeholder for future development it should be fleshed-out. In any other case, it should be eliminated.
